benchmark_details.name: EgoPlan-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: EgoPlan-Bench is a comprehensive benchmark to evaluate the planning abilities of Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) in real-world scenarios from an egocentric perspective, emphasizing the evaluation of planning capabilities through realistic tasks, diverse action plans, and intricate visual observations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Evaluate the planning capabilities of MLLMs in human-level tasks based on multimodal input, including visual observations.

data.source: Derived from large-scale egocentric videos such as Epic-Kitchens and Ego4D with manual verification.
data.annotation: Questions are auto-generated and verified by human annotators.

methodology.calculation: Metric calculations are based on the proportion of correctly answered questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better planning capability of the model.
methodology.validation: The benchmark data is divided into EgoPlan-Val for validation and EgoPlan-Test for testing.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The personal information in used videos has been meticulously de-identified.
